bibl.title: New Papyri and the History of Ancient Grammar: The ἐπίρρημα Chapter in P. Berol. 9917.

bibl.title: Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts.

bibl.seg: Wouters Alfons and Pierre Swiggers, New Papyri and the History of Ancient Grammar: The ἐπίρρημα Chapter in P. Berol. 9917.

Stephanos Matthaios, Franco Montanari and Antonios Rengakos (Edd.), Ancient Scholarship and Grammar. Archetypes, Concepts and Contexts = Trends in Classics. Supplementary Volumes. 8 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 313-330, 1 pl.
1. Introduction. - 2. A case Study: P. Berol. Inv. 9917 (= M.-P.3 2144.01; LDAB 5496). - 3. The adverb in the P. Berol. Inv. 9917 [edition and commentary of folio 12]. - 4. Conclusion.
